channel.title: Image help (See through the background of it)
channel.description: I need some help with my forums logo. How do you make it so you have the picture but the background isn't white? It just blends with the background it's at? I've added the logo if u wanna fix but a simple TUT is nice[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2009, 08:40:39 pm[/size][hr]I REALLY need help!

item.title: Image help (See through the background of it)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

You need something other than just paint. Any legitimate graphics program will allow you to cut the image itself and leave a blank. Most of them have a tool called “magic stick” or “magic pen” that will let you select a certain area that you don’t want, and whatever you apply the picture to it will just show that as the background, or as you say “blends with the background”.

Read full topic
item.source: Image help (See through the background of it)
